quote: The main reason to incorporate as an S-corp is to save on self-employment tax.
why_clipworthy: It provides a clear, actionable reason for incorporating.
suggested_hook: Want to save on taxes? Here's why you should consider an S-corp.

quote: Setting up an LLC is very easy and provides essential asset protection.
why_clipworthy: It simplifies the process of asset protection for listeners.
